description: K8s Control Panel component : Kube Manager

panels.description: Package version info
panels.title: INFO

panels.description: Represents which ovnkube-master pod is leader
panels.title: STATUS

panels.description: Overall cluster E2E status: HEALTY, UPDATING or FAULTED
panels.title: E2E STATUS

panels.description: Average number of open flows installed per node
panels.title: AVG OPEN FLOWS (TOP K)

panels.description: Memory usage within ovnkube-master pod
panels.title: MEMORY

panels.description: CPU rates within ovnkube-master pod containers
panels.title: CPU

panels.description: Rate of total number of time service sync happens inside cluster
panels.title: SVC SYNC TOTAL (RATE/SEC)

panels.description: Rate of total number of times a service is requeued after failing to sync with OVN
panels.title: SVC REQUEUE TOTAL (RATE/SEC)

panels.description: The latency between pod creation and setting the OVN annotations
panels.title: POD CREATE LATENCY (99th percentile)

panels.description: The rate of a particular resource has been updated with an event
panels.title: UPDATE RATE/SEC

panels.description: The time/sec taken to complete resource update by an handler. This measures the latency for all of the handlers for a given resource.
panels.title: UPDATE LATENCY RATE/SEC (99th percentile)

panels.description: Tracks multiple manager leaders and no leader cases
panels.title: NUMBER OF LEADERS

panels.description: Tracks how frequently kube manager  leadership changes
panels.title: KUBE MANAGER LEADERSHIP CHANGES

panels.description: The latency of syncing a service with the OVN load balancers
panels.title: LB SERVICE SYNC (99th percentile)

panels.description: The rate of change of various logfiles
panels.title: RATE OF LOGFILE CHANGES

panels.description: Current depth of manager workqueue
panels.title: WQ DEPTH

panels.description: Total number of adds handled by workqueue
panels.title: WQ ITEMS RATE

panels.description: Total number of retries handled by workqueue
panels.title: WQ RETRY ITEMS RATE

panels.description: How long processing an item from the work queue takes.
panels.title: WQ AVG WORK DURATION

panels.description: How long an item stays in the work queue.
panels.title: WQ AVG ITEMS DURATION

panels.description: How many seconds has the longest running processor for workqueue been running
panels.title: WQ LONGEST RUNNING PROCESSOR

panels.description: How many seconds of work has done that is in progress and hasn't been observed by work_duration. Large values indicate stuck threads. One can deduce the number of stuck threads by observing the rate at which this increases.
panels.title: WQ UNFINISHED/STUCK ITEMS

panels.description: Built-in Prometheus Kube Alerts
panels.title: Kube Alerts

title: OVN K8s / Cluster Manager
